column4: I inadvertantly gave ATI a bad rap, my particular embedded ATI is just a bit old...It works, that about all.
ati and now nvidia leaving older cards in the driver-update dust. It's going to make a bunch of machines that were "good enough", no longer usable.
yeah, that's ok. I don't "need" compiz!
exactly, I kind of forgot that pert, thanks! :)
